content.text:
Fixed! The top navigation bar is now consistent across all main module functions:

1. **Created shared NavigationHeader component** - Consistent header with logo, navigation, and auth buttons
2. **Added missing pages** - MembersPage and AboutPage with complete functionality
3. **Fixed routing** - All navigation buttons (æ´»å‹•, æœƒå“¡, é—œæ–¼, ç™»å…¥, è¨»å†Š) now work properly
4. **Consistent layout** - Same header appears on all pages with proper highlighting of current page
5. **Auth integration** - Login/register buttons open auth modal, logged-in users see profile and logout

Navigation now works correctly between all pages and maintains consistent design and functionality.

content.content:
1â†’# CLAUDE.md
     2â†’
     3â†’This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.
     4â†’
     5â†’## Development Commands
     6â†’
     7â†’### Installation and Setup
     8â†’```bash
     9â†’# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
    10â†’npm run install:all
    11â†’
    12â†’# Install only client dependencies
    13â†’cd client && npm install
    14â†’
    15â†’# Install only server dependencies (when available)
    16â†’cd server && npm install
    17â†’```
    18â†’
    19â†’### Development
    20â†’```bash
    21â†’# Start both client and server in development mode
    22â†’npm run dev
    23â†’
    24â†’# Start only client (frontend)
    25â†’npm run dev:client
    26â†’
    27â†’# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
    28â†’npm run dev:server
    29â†’```
    30â†’
    31â†’### Build and Production
    32â†’```bash
    33â†’# Build both client and server
    34â†’npm run build
    35â†’
    36â†’# Build only client
    37â†’npm run build:client
    38â†’
    39â†’# Build only server (when available)
    40â†’npm run build:server
    41â†’
    42â†’# Start production server
    43â†’npm start
    44â†’```
    45â†’
    46â†’### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
    47â†’```bash
    48â†’# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
    49â†’npm run dev
    50â†’
    51â†’# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
    52â†’npm run dev:fresh
    53â†’
    54â†’# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
    55â†’npm run clear-cache
    56â†’
    57â†’# Production build
    58â†’npm run build
    59â†’
    60â†’# ESLint code linting
    61â†’npm run lint
    62â†’
    63â†’# Preview production build
    64â†’npm run preview
    65â†’```
    66â†’
    67â†’## Architecture Overview
    68â†’
    69â†’### Project Structure
    70â†’```
    71â†’shesocial/
    72â†’â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
    73â†’â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
    74â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/        # Reusable UI components
    75â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Page components
    76â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
    77â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
    78â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
    79â†’â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
    80â†’â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
    81â†’â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
    82â†’â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
    83â†’â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
    84â†’â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
    85â†’```
    86â†’
    87â†’### Technology Stack
    88â†’
    89â†’**Frontend (Complete)**
    90â†’- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
    91â†’- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
    92â†’- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
    93â†’- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
    94â†’- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync
    95â†’
    96â†’**Backend (Planned)**
    97â†’- **Runtime**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
    98â†’- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)
    99â†’- **Sync**: Bidirectional sync with IndexedDB
   100â†’- **Deployment**: Render.com
   101â†’
   102â†’### Key Features Implemented
   103â†’
   104â†’1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   105â†’   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   106â†’   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   107â†’   - Sync queue for offline operations
   108â†’   - Network status detection
   109â†’
   110â†’2. **Luxury Design System**
   111â†’   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   112â†’   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   113â†’   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   114â†’   - Glass morphism effects
   115â†’   - Responsive mobile-first design
   116â†’
   117â†’3. **Taiwan Localization**
   118â†’   - Traditional Chinese interface
   119â†’   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   120â†’   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users
   121â†’
   122â†’4. **PWA Implementation**
   123â†’   - Service Worker with background sync
   124â†’   - Offline-first capabilities
   125â†’   - App installation support
   126â†’   - Push notification ready
   127â†’   - Taiwan-optimized manifest
   128â†’
   129â†’## Database Architecture
   130â†’
   131â†’### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
   132â†’- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
   133â†’- **events**: Social events with metadata
   134â†’- **bookings**: User event bookings
   135â†’- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
shesocial/
â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/        # Reusable UI components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Page components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**
- **Runtime**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)
- **Sync**: Bidirectional sync with IndexedDB
- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)
- `useOfflineDB()`: Main database hook
- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)
- **Colors**: Luxury palette with gold, champagne, pearl themes
- **Typography**: Inter + Noto Sans TC for multilingual support
- **Components**: Custom luxury button, card, and glass effect styles
- **Animations**: Fade-in, slide-up, and pulse-luxury animations

## Development Notes

### Current Status - Core Platform Complete! ğŸ‰
- âœ… Frontend architecture complete
- âœ… IndexedDB offline storage implemented
- âœ… Luxury design system implemented
- âœ… Taiwan localization complete

- âœ… **Brand identity integrated with luxury logo and color optimization**

### Next Development Phase (Phase 2)
1. **Payment Integration**: LINE Pay (primary) + ECPay (backup) + Apple/Google Pay
2. **Media Features**: Cloudinary video upload + profile management

4. **Analytics & Monitoring**: User behavior tracking + performance monitoring

### File Locations

**Backend:**

**Authentication:**

### Development Environment
- Client runs on http://localhost:5173

- API documentation: http://localhost:3001

### Authentication Endpoints
- Register: `POST /api/auth/register`
- Login: `POST /api/auth/login`
- Current user: `GET /api/auth/me`
- Refresh token: `POST /api/auth/refresh`

- Logout: `POST /api/auth/logout`

### Key Dependencies

**Frontend:**
- **dexie**: "^4.0.11" - IndexedDB wrapper
- **zustand**: "^5.0.6" - State management
- **react**: "^19.1.0" - UI framework
- **tailwindcss**: "^3.4.17" - Styling
- **typescript**: "~5.8.3" - Type safety

- **vite-plugin-pwa**: "^1.0.1" - PWA functionality
- **workbox-webpack-plugin**: "^7.3.0" - Service Worker

**Backend:**
- **nedb**: "^1.8.0" - Lightweight embedded database
- **express**: "^4.21.2" - Web framework
- **cors**: "^2.8.5" - Cross-origin resource sharing
- **helmet**: "^8.1.0" - Security middleware
- **morgan**: "^1.10.0" - HTTP request logger
- **bcrypt**: "^6.0.0" - Password hashing
- **jsonwebtoken**: "^9.0.2" - JWT authentication
- **typescript**: "^5.8.3" - Type safety
- **ts-node**: "^10.9.2" - TypeScript execution
- **nodemon**: "^3.1.10" - Development server

### Membership System
**4-Tier Membership Structure:**
- **Regular**: Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month (basic access)
- **VIP**: Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month (priority booking)
- **Premium 1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package (priority booking + vouchers)
- **Premium 2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (full access + view participants)

**Permission Levels:**
- `viewParticipants`: Only premium_2500 members
- `priorityBooking`: VIP and premium members
- API access varies by membership tier

### Payment Integration (Planned)
- Primary: LINE Pay
- Secondary: Apple Pay, Google Pay
- Backup: ECPay (credit cards)
- Future: Bank transfer

This is a Taiwan-focused luxury social platform with emphasis on offline-first architecture, privacy protection, premium user experience, and secure authentication.

## Key Technical Achievements

### Task 5: Data Synchronization Service âœ… Complete
- **Enhanced Sync Service**: JWT authentication integration with permission-based filtering
- **Bidirectional Sync Logic**: Complete CRDT-style IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based resolution with 1-minute threshold + field-level merging
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic (2^retries minutes, max 30min)
- **Network Quality Detection**: Real-time quality assessment (good/slow/offline) with adaptive behavior
- **Background Sync Integration**: Service Worker API integration with priority-based triggers
- **Sync Progress UI**: Comprehensive monitoring components with Traditional Chinese localization
- **Authentication-Aware Sync**: Collection filtering based on user membership permissions

### Sync Features Implemented:
- **Smart Array Merging**: Videos and participants merged without duplicates
- **Priority-Based Queue**: High/medium/low priority processing with different retry limits
- **Error Classification**: Retryable vs non-retryable error detection
- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking
- **Luxury UI Components**: Mobile-first sync status indicator and admin panel
- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

## Vite Cache Management

### Normal Development (Recommended)
```bash
npm run dev  # Uses Vite's optimized caching for best performance
```

### Cache Troubleshooting (When Needed)
```bash
# Force fresh dependency optimization
npm run dev:fresh

# Manual cache clearing
```

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
shesocial/
â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/        # Reusable UI components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Page components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**
- **Runtime**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)
- **Sync**: Bidirectional sync with IndexedDB
- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)
- `useOfflineDB()`: Main database hook
- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)
- **Colors**: Luxury palette with gold, champagne, pearl themes
- **Typography**: Inter + Noto Sans TC for multilingual support
- **Components**: Custom luxury button, card, and glass effect styles
- **Animations**: Fade-in, slide-up, and pulse-luxury animations

## Development Notes

- âœ… Luxury design system implemented

### Next Development Phase (Phase 2)
1. **Payment Integration**: LINE Pay (primary) + ECPay (backup) + Apple/Google Pay
2. **Media Features**: Cloudinary video upload + profile management
3. **Production Deployment**: Render.com + domain + SSL configuration
4. **Analytics & Monitoring**: User behavior tracking + performance monitoring

**Backend:**

**Authentication:**

### Development Environment
- Client runs on http://localhost:5173
- Server runs on http://localhost:3001
- API base URL: http://localhost:3001/api
- Health check: http://localhost:3001/health
- API documentation: http://localhost:3001

### Authentication Endpoints
- Register: `POST /api/auth/register`
- Login: `POST /api/auth/login`
- Current user: `GET /api/auth/me`
- Refresh token: `POST /api/auth/refresh`
- Change password: `PUT /api/auth/change-password`
- Logout: `POST /api/auth/logout`

### Key Dependencies

**Frontend:**
- **dexie**: "^4.0.11" - IndexedDB wrapper
- **zustand**: "^5.0.6" - State management
- **react**: "^19.1.0" - UI framework
- **tailwindcss**: "^3.4.17" - Styling
- **typescript**: "~5.8.3" - Type safety
- **vite**: "^7.0.3" - Build tool
- **vite-plugin-pwa**: "^1.0.1" - PWA functionality
- **workbox-webpack-plugin**: "^7.3.0" - Service Worker

**Backend:**
- **nedb**: "^1.8.0" - Lightweight embedded database
- **express**: "^4.21.2" - Web framework
- **cors**: "^2.8.5" - Cross-origin resource sharing
- **helmet**: "^8.1.0" - Security middleware
- **morgan**: "^1.10.0" - HTTP request logger
- **bcrypt**: "^6.0.0" - Password hashing
- **jsonwebtoken**: "^9.0.2" - JWT authentication
- **typescript**: "^5.8.3" - Type safety
- **ts-node**: "^10.9.2" - TypeScript execution
- **nodemon**: "^3.1.10" - Development server

### Membership System
**4-Tier Membership Structure:**
- **Regular**: Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month (basic access)
- **VIP**: Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month (priority booking)
- **Premium 1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package (priority booking + vouchers)
- **Premium 2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (full access + view participants)

**Permission Levels:**
- `viewParticipants`: Only premium_2500 members
- `priorityBooking`: VIP and premium members
- API access varies by membership tier

### Payment Integration (Planned)
- Primary: LINE Pay
- Secondary: Apple Pay, Google Pay
- Backup: ECPay (credit cards)
- Future: Bank transfer

This is a Taiwan-focused luxury social platform with emphasis on offline-first architecture, privacy protection, premium user experience, and secure authentication.

## Key Technical Achievements

### Task 5: Data Synchronization Service âœ… Complete
- **Enhanced Sync Service**: JWT authentication integration with permission-based filtering
- **Bidirectional Sync Logic**: Complete CRDT-style IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based resolution with 1-minute threshold + field-level merging
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic (2^retries minutes, max 30min)
- **Network Quality Detection**: Real-time quality assessment (good/slow/offline) with adaptive behavior
- **Background Sync Integration**: Service Worker API integration with priority-based triggers
- **Sync Progress UI**: Comprehensive monitoring components with Traditional Chinese localization
- **Authentication-Aware Sync**: Collection filtering based on user membership permissions

### Sync Features Implemented:
- **Smart Array Merging**: Videos and participants merged without duplicates
- **Priority-Based Queue**: High/medium/low priority processing with different retry limits
- **Error Classification**: Retryable vs non-retryable error detection
- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking
- **Luxury UI Components**: Mobile-first sync status indicator and admin panel
- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

```bash

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**

- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)

- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)
- `useOfflineDB()`: Main database hook
- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)
- **Colors**: Luxury palette with gold, champagne, pearl themes
- **Typography**: Inter + Noto Sans TC for multilingual support
- **Components**: Custom luxury button, card, and glass effect styles
- **Animations**: Fade-in, slide-up, and pulse-luxury animations

### Key Dependencies

**Frontend:**

### Membership System
**4-Tier Membership Structure:**
- **Regular**: Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month (basic access)

- **Premium 1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package (priority booking + vouchers)
- **Premium 2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (full access + view participants)

**Permission Levels:**
- `viewParticipants`: Only premium_2500 members
- `priorityBooking`: VIP and premium members
- API access varies by membership tier

### Payment Integration (Planned)
- Primary: LINE Pay
- Secondary: Apple Pay, Google Pay
- Backup: ECPay (credit cards)
- Future: Bank transfer

This is a Taiwan-focused luxury social platform with emphasis on offline-first architecture, privacy protection, premium user experience, and secure authentication.

## Key Technical Achievements

### Task 5: Data Synchronization Service âœ… Complete
- **Enhanced Sync Service**: JWT authentication integration with permission-based filtering
- **Bidirectional Sync Logic**: Complete CRDT-style IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based resolution with 1-minute threshold + field-level merging
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic (2^retries minutes, max 30min)
- **Network Quality Detection**: Real-time quality assessment (good/slow/offline) with adaptive behavior
- **Background Sync Integration**: Service Worker API integration with priority-based triggers
- **Sync Progress UI**: Comprehensive monitoring components with Traditional Chinese localization
- **Authentication-Aware Sync**: Collection filtering based on user membership permissions

### Sync Features Implemented:
- **Smart Array Merging**: Videos and participants merged without duplicates
- **Priority-Based Queue**: High/medium/low priority processing with different retry limits
- **Error Classification**: Retryable vs non-retryable error detection
- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking
- **Luxury UI Components**: Mobile-first sync status indicator and admin panel
- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

## Vite Cache Management

### Normal Development (Recommended)
```bash
npm run dev  # Uses Vite's optimized caching for best performance
```

### Cache Troubleshooting (When Needed)
```bash
# Force fresh dependency optimization
npm run dev:fresh

# Manual cache clearing
npm run clear-cache

# Hard browser refresh
Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
```

### Understanding Vite Behavior
- **Module Duplication in Sources Tab**: Normal - shows both source files and transformed modules
- **Dependency Cache**: Located in `node_modules/.vite/` - auto-invalidated on dependency changes
- **Production Builds**: Automatic content hashing for cache busting (`assets/[name]-[hash].js`)

## Reminders and Notes
- Development environment is stable and working correctly
- Vite cache is properly configured for optimal development experience
- Brand logo integrated with CSS filter optimization for luxury theming
- Authentication system complete with JWT + bcrypt security
- 4-tier membership system with role-based permissions implemented
- Data synchronization service complete with enterprise-grade features
- Project status: Core platform complete and ready for Phase 2 development

## Brand Assets
### Logo Implementation
- **Logo File**: `client/public/logo.jpeg` - Official SheSocial logo with heart-shaped couple silhouettes
- **Header Integration**: 48x48px with luxury gold CSS filter treatment
- **Favicon**: Logo set as browser favicon and PWA icon
- **Color Optimization**: CSS filters applied to match luxury gold theme
  ```css
  filter: brightness-0 invert sepia saturate-[3] hue-rotate-[25deg] brightness-[1.2]
  ```
- **Alternative Options**: SVG conversion recommended for perfect scaling and easy color changes

## Recent Development Logs

### Vite and Dependencies Challenges
- Experienced Vite v7.0.3 build issues
- Error in `src/types/database.ts`: No matching export for `UserProfile`
- Build failure in `src/store/authStore.ts`
- Two versions of `offline-dbs.ts` detected
- Successful dependency optimization for react-dom/client, dexie, zustand

This is a Taiwan-focused luxury social platform with emphasis on offline-first architecture, privacy protection, premium user experience, and secure authentication.

## Key Technical Achievements

### Task 5: Data Synchronization Service âœ… Complete
- **Enhanced Sync Service**: JWT authentication integration with permission-based filtering
- **Bidirectional Sync Logic**: Complete CRDT-style IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based resolution with 1-minute threshold + field-level merging
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic (2^retries minutes, max 30min)
- **Network Quality Detection**: Real-time quality assessment (good/slow/offline) with adaptive behavior
- **Background Sync Integration**: Service Worker API integration with priority-based triggers
- **Sync Progress UI**: Comprehensive monitoring components with Traditional Chinese localization
- **Authentication-Aware Sync**: Collection filtering based on user membership permissions

### Sync Features Implemented:
- **Smart Array Merging**: Videos and participants merged without duplicates
- **Priority-Based Queue**: High/medium/low priority processing with different retry limits
- **Error Classification**: Retryable vs non-retryable error detection
- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking
- **Luxury UI Components**: Mobile-first sync status indicator and admin panel
- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

## Vite Cache Management

### Normal Development (Recommended)
```bash
npm run dev  # Uses Vite's optimized caching for best performance
```

### Cache Troubleshooting (When Needed)
```bash
# Force fresh dependency optimization
npm run dev:fresh

# Manual cache clearing
npm run clear-cache

# Hard browser refresh
Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
```

### Understanding Vite Behavior
- **Module Duplication in Sources Tab**: Normal - shows both source files and transformed modules
- **Dependency Cache**: Located in `node_modules/.vite/` - auto-invalidated on dependency changes
- **Production Builds**: Automatic content hashing for cache busting (`assets/[name]-[hash].js`)

## Reminders and Notes
- Development environment is stable and working correctly
- Vite cache is properly configured for optimal development experience
- Brand logo integrated with CSS filter optimization for luxury theming
- Authentication system complete with JWT + bcrypt security
- 4-tier membership system with role-based permissions implemented

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
shesocial/
â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/

â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**
- **Runtime**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)
- **Sync**: Bidirectional sync with IndexedDB
- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)

- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)

- **Typography**: Inter + Noto Sans TC for multilingual support
- **Components**: Custom luxury button, card, and glass effect styles

Fixed! The login and register buttons should now work properly. Here's what I implemented:

**Authentication System Fixed:**

1. **AuthModal Component** - Updated to accept correct props (mode, onClose, onToggleMode)

2. **LoginForm Component** - Complete functional form with:
   - Email/password validation
   - Loading states with spinner
   - Error handling
   - Integration with useAuthStore
   - Switch to register functionality

3. **RegisterForm Component** - Full registration form with:
   - Name, email, password, confirm password fields
   - Membership tier selection
   - Form validation (password confirmation, length check)
   - Loading states
   - Error handling
   - Switch to login functionality
   - Terms acceptance notice

**Features:**
- âœ… Click ç™»å…¥/è¨»å†Š buttons to open modal
- âœ… Switch between login/register modes
- âœ… Form validation and error messages
- âœ… Loading states during authentication
- âœ… Proper integration with authentication store
- âœ… Luxury styling consistent with design system
- âœ… Mobile-responsive forms

The authentication flow should now work completely - users can register new accounts, login, and the system will integrate with the backend authentication API.

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
shesocial/
â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/        # Reusable UI components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Page components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
```

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```

â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**

**Backend (Planned)**

- **Deployment**: Render.com

   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**

   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**

   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)

- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering

- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

toolUseResult.originalFile:
# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure
```
shesocial/
â”œâ”€â”€ client/                    # React frontend (main application)
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ src/
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ components/        # Reusable UI components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/            # Page components
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ db/               # IndexedDB offline database
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ hooks/            # Custom React hooks
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ services/         # API and sync services
â”‚   â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ types/            # TypeScript type definitions
â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€ utils/            # Utility functions
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ public/               # Static assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ package.json          # Frontend dependencies
â”œâ”€â”€ server/                   # Node.js backend (planned, not implemented)
â””â”€â”€ shared/                   # Shared types and utilities (planned)
```

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**
- **Runtime**: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- **Database**: NeDB (lightweight embedded database)
- **Sync**: Bidirectional sync with IndexedDB
- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)
- `useOfflineDB()`: Main database hook
- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)
- **Colors**: Luxury palette with gold, champagne, pearl themes
- **Typography**: Inter + Noto Sans TC for multilingual support
- **Components**: Custom luxury button, card, and glass effect styles
- **Animations**: Fade-in, slide-up, and pulse-luxury animations

## Development Notes

### Current Status - Core Platform Complete! ğŸ‰
- âœ… Frontend architecture complete
- âœ… IndexedDB offline storage implemented
- âœ… Luxury design system implemented
- âœ… Taiwan localization complete
- âœ… Service Worker PWA implementation complete
- âœ… NeDB backend server implemented and running
- âœ… User authentication system implemented (JWT + bcrypt)
- âœ… Membership tier permissions and role-based access control
- âœ… Complete data synchronization service with CRDT conflict resolution
- âœ… Sync progress UI components with real-time monitoring
- âœ… **Event management frontend complete (CRUD + booking + participant management)**
- âœ… **Development environment stable and cache issues resolved**
- âœ… **Brand identity integrated with luxury logo and color optimization**
- âœ… **Complete navigation system with consistent header across all pages**
- âœ… **Full routing implementation for all main module functions (æ´»å‹•, æœƒå“¡, é—œæ–¼)**
- âœ… **Authentication integration with login/register modal system**
- âœ… **Functional authentication forms with validation and error handling**
- âŒ Payment integration pending (next phase)

### Next Development Phase (Phase 2)
1. **Payment Integration**: LINE Pay (primary) + ECPay (backup) + Apple/Google Pay
2. **Media Features**: Cloudinary video upload + profile management
3. **Production Deployment**: Render.com + domain + SSL configuration
4. **Analytics & Monitoring**: User behavior tracking + performance monitoring

### File Locations

**Frontend:**
- Main database: `client/src/db/offline-db.ts:22`

- Type definitions: `client/src/types/database.ts:12`

**Backend:**

### Development Environment
- Client runs on http://localhost:5173
- Server runs on http://localhost:3001
- API base URL: http://localhost:3001/api
- Health check: http://localhost:3001/health
- API documentation: http://localhost:3001

### Authentication Endpoints
- Register: `POST /api/auth/register`
- Login: `POST /api/auth/login`
- Current user: `GET /api/auth/me`
- Refresh token: `POST /api/auth/refresh`
- Change password: `PUT /api/auth/change-password`
- Logout: `POST /api/auth/logout`

### Key Dependencies

**Frontend:**
- **dexie**: "^4.0.11" - IndexedDB wrapper
- **zustand**: "^5.0.6" - State management
- **react**: "^19.1.0" - UI framework
- **tailwindcss**: "^3.4.17" - Styling
- **typescript**: "~5.8.3" - Type safety
- **vite**: "^7.0.3" - Build tool
- **vite-plugin-pwa**: "^1.0.1" - PWA functionality
- **workbox-webpack-plugin**: "^7.3.0" - Service Worker

**Backend:**
- **nedb**: "^1.8.0" - Lightweight embedded database
- **express**: "^4.21.2" - Web framework
- **cors**: "^2.8.5" - Cross-origin resource sharing
- **helmet**: "^8.1.0" - Security middleware
- **morgan**: "^1.10.0" - HTTP request logger
- **bcrypt**: "^6.0.0" - Password hashing
- **jsonwebtoken**: "^9.0.2" - JWT authentication
- **typescript**: "^5.8.3" - Type safety
- **ts-node**: "^10.9.2" - TypeScript execution
- **nodemon**: "^3.1.10" - Development server

### Membership System
**4-Tier Membership Structure:**
- **Regular**: Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month (basic access)
- **VIP**: Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month (priority booking)
- **Premium 1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package (priority booking + vouchers)
- **Premium 2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (full access + view participants)

**Permission Levels:**
- `viewParticipants`: Only premium_2500 members
- `priorityBooking`: VIP and premium members
- API access varies by membership tier

### Payment Integration (Planned)
- Primary: LINE Pay
- Secondary: Apple Pay, Google Pay
- Backup: ECPay (credit cards)
- Future: Bank transfer

This is a Taiwan-focused luxury social platform with emphasis on offline-first architecture, privacy protection, premium user experience, and secure authentication.

## Key Technical Achievements

### Task 5: Data Synchronization Service âœ… Complete
- **Enhanced Sync Service**: JWT authentication integration with permission-based filtering
- **Bidirectional Sync Logic**: Complete CRDT-style IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based resolution with 1-minute threshold + field-level merging
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic (2^retries minutes, max 30min)
- **Network Quality Detection**: Real-time quality assessment (good/slow/offline) with adaptive behavior
- **Background Sync Integration**: Service Worker API integration with priority-based triggers
- **Sync Progress UI**: Comprehensive monitoring components with Traditional Chinese localization
- **Authentication-Aware Sync**: Collection filtering based on user membership permissions

### Sync Features Implemented:
- **Smart Array Merging**: Videos and participants merged without duplicates
- **Priority-Based Queue**: High/medium/low priority processing with different retry limits
- **Error Classification**: Retryable vs non-retryable error detection
- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking
- **Luxury UI Components**: Mobile-first sync status indicator and admin panel
- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

### Task 6: Complete Navigation System âœ… Complete
- **Shared Navigation Header**: Consistent NavigationHeader component across all pages
- **Complete Page Structure**: EventsPage, MembersPage, AboutPage with full functionality
- **Proper Routing**: App.tsx handles all navigation between main module functions
- **Authentication Integration**: Login/register buttons open AuthModal with proper state management
- **Current Page Highlighting**: Navigation shows active page with luxury gold styling
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first navigation with consistent luxury theming
- **User Status Display**: Shows logged-in user info and membership tier in header
- **Logout Functionality**: Proper logout handling with state cleanup

### Task 7: Authentication Forms Implementation âœ… Complete
- **Functional Login Form**: Complete LoginForm with email/password validation
- **Comprehensive Register Form**: Full registration with name, email, password, membership selection
- **Form Validation**: Password confirmation, length checks, email validation
- **Error Handling**: User-friendly error messages with proper styling
- **Loading States**: Spinner animations during authentication requests
- **Modal Integration**: Seamless switching between login/register modes
- **Store Integration**: Proper integration with useAuthStore for API calls
- **Luxury Styling**: Consistent luxury design system throughout forms
- **Mobile Responsive**: Optimized forms for mobile-first experience
- **Business Logic**: Membership tier selection and terms acceptance

## Vite Cache Management

### Normal Development (Recommended)
```bash
npm run dev  # Uses Vite's optimized caching for best performance
```

### Cache Troubleshooting (When Needed)
```bash
# Force fresh dependency optimization
npm run dev:fresh

# Manual cache clearing
npm run clear-cache

# Hard browser refresh
Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
```

### Understanding Vite Behavior
- **Module Duplication in Sources Tab**: Normal - shows both source files and transformed modules
- **Dependency Cache**: Located in `node_modules/.vite/` - auto-invalidated on dependency changes
- **Production Builds**: Automatic content hashing for cache busting (`assets/[name]-[hash].js`)

## Reminders and Notes
- Development environment is stable and working correctly
- Vite cache is properly configured for optimal development experience
- Brand logo integrated with CSS filter optimization for luxury theming
- Authentication system complete with JWT + bcrypt security
- 4-tier membership system with role-based permissions implemented
- Data synchronization service complete with enterprise-grade features
- **Navigation system complete with consistent header across all pages**
- **Full routing system implemented for all main module functions**
- **Authentication modal system integrated with navigation**
- **Complete authentication forms with validation and error handling**
- **Login/register functionality fully operational**
- Project status: Core platform complete and ready for Phase 2 development

## Brand Assets
### Logo Implementation
- **Logo File**: `client/public/logo.jpeg` - Official SheSocial logo with heart-shaped couple silhouettes
- **Header Integration**: 48x48px with luxury gold CSS filter treatment
- **Favicon**: Logo set as browser favicon and PWA icon
- **Color Optimization**: CSS filters applied to match luxury gold theme
  ```css
  filter: brightness-0 invert sepia saturate-[3] hue-rotate-[25deg] brightness-[1.2]
  ```
- **Alternative Options**: SVG conversion recommended for perfect scaling and easy color changes

## Recent Development Logs

### Vite and Dependencies Challenges
- Experienced Vite v7.0.3 build issues
- Error in `src/types/database.ts`: No matching export for `UserProfile`
- Build failure in `src/store/authStore.ts`
- Two versions of `offline-dbs.ts` detected
- Successful dependency optimization for react-dom/client, dexie, zustand

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash
# Development server (runs on localhost:5173)
npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)
npm run clear-cache

# Production build
npm run build

# ESLint code linting
npm run lint

# Preview production build
npm run preview
```

## Architecture Overview

### Project Structure

### Technology Stack

**Frontend (Complete)**
- **Framework**: React 19 + TypeScript + Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS 3.4.17 with luxury design system
- **State Management**: React Hooks + Zustand
- **Database**: IndexedDB (Dexie.js) for offline-first storage
- **PWA**: Service Worker + PWA capabilities with background sync

**Backend (Planned)**

- **Deployment**: Render.com

### Key Features Implemented

1. **Offline-First Architecture**
   - IndexedDB storage with Dexie.js
   - NeDB-compatible document structure
   - Sync queue for offline operations
   - Network status detection

2. **Luxury Design System**
   - Custom Tailwind CSS configuration
   - Luxury color palette (gold, champagne, pearl, rose)
   - Official brand logo with CSS filter optimization for luxury gold theming
   - Glass morphism effects
   - Responsive mobile-first design

3. **Taiwan Localization**
   - Traditional Chinese interface
   - Noto Sans TC + Noto Serif TC fonts
   - Mobile-optimized for Taiwan users

4. **PWA Implementation**
   - Service Worker with background sync
   - Offline-first capabilities
   - App installation support
   - Push notification ready
   - Taiwan-optimized manifest

## Database Architecture

### IndexedDB Structure (client/src/db/offline-db.ts)
- **users**: User profiles with membership tiers
- **events**: Social events with metadata
- **bookings**: User event bookings
- **syncQueue**: Pending sync operations

### TypeScript Types 
**Note**: Types are currently inlined in `authStore.ts` due to browser caching issues during development
Key interfaces:
- `UserProfile`: User data with membership info (inlined in authStore.ts)
- `EventData`: Event details with participant management
- `BookingData`: Event booking records
- `SyncQueueItem`: Offline sync operations

### Membership System
- **regular**: Basic membership (Â¥600 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **vip**: VIP membership (Â¥1000 entry + Â¥300/month)
- **premium_1300**: Â¥1300 voucher package
- **premium_2500**: Â¥2500 voucher package (can view participants)

## React Hooks (client/src/hooks/useOfflineDB.ts)
- `useOfflineDB()`: Main database hook
- `useUsers()`: User operations
- `useEvents()`: Event operations
- `useBookings()`: Booking operations
- `useNetworkSync()`: Network status and sync
- `useDBStats()`: Database statistics

## Sync Service (client/src/services/sync-service.ts)
- **Bidirectional Sync**: Complete IndexedDB â†” NeDB synchronization
- **Authentication Integration**: JWT-secured API calls with permission filtering
- **Advanced Conflict Resolution**: Time-based + field-level merging strategies
- **Intelligent Queue Management**: Exponential backoff retry logic with priority
- **Network Adaptation**: Quality detection and adaptive sync behavior
- **Background Sync**: Service Worker integration with priority-based triggers
- **Real-time Monitoring**: Comprehensive sync statistics and progress tracking

## Business Rules (BUSINESS_RULES.md)
- Event scheduling: 6 events per 3-month cycle
- Voucher system: $100 and $200 vouchers for 2-day trips only
- Participant viewing: Only premium_2500 members can view full participant lists
- Video interviews: Required for all new members (30 minutes)

## Design System (client/tailwind.config.js)

- **Module Duplication in Sources Tab**: Normal - shows both source files and transformed modules

# CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

## Development Commands

### Installation and Setup
```bash
# Install all dependencies (root, client, and server)
npm run install:all

# Install only client dependencies
cd client && npm install

# Install only server dependencies (when available)
cd server && npm install
```

### Development
```bash
# Start both client and server in development mode
npm run dev

# Start only client (frontend)
npm run dev:client

# Start only server (backend) - when implemented
npm run dev:server
```

### Build and Production
```bash
# Build both client and server
npm run build

# Build only client
npm run build:client

# Build only server (when available)
npm run build:server

# Start production server
npm start
```

### Client-specific Commands (from client/ directory)
```bash

npm run dev

# Development server with fresh dependency cache (troubleshooting)
npm run dev:fresh

# Clear Vite cache manually (when needed)

# ESLint code linting

# Preview production build

```

- **Real-time Statistics**: Detailed sync metrics, error rates, and performance tracking

- **Permission Control**: VIP+ for users collection, all authenticated for events/bookings

### Task 6: Complete Navigation System âœ… Complete
- **Shared Navigation Header**: Consistent NavigationHeader component across all pages
- **Complete Page Structure**: EventsPage, MembersPage, AboutPage with full functionality
- **Proper Routing**: App.tsx handles all navigation between main module functions
- **Authentication Integration**: Login/register buttons open AuthModal with proper state management
- **Current Page Highlighting**: Navigation shows active page with luxury gold styling
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first navigation with consistent luxury theming
- **User Status Display**: Shows logged-in user info and membership tier in header
- **Logout Functionality**: Proper logout handling with state cleanup

### Task 7: Authentication Forms Implementation âœ… Complete
- **Functional Login Form**: Complete LoginForm with email/password validation
- **Comprehensive Register Form**: Full registration with name, email, password, membership selection

## Vite Cache Management

### Normal Development (Recommended)
```bash
npm run dev  # Uses Vite's optimized caching for best performance
```

### Cache Troubleshooting (When Needed)
```bash
# Force fresh dependency optimization
npm run dev:fresh

# Manual cache clearing
npm run clear-cache

# Hard browser refresh
Ctrl+Shift+R (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+R (Mac)
```

### Understanding Vite Behavior
- **Module Duplication in Sources Tab**: Normal - shows both source files and transformed modules
- **Dependency Cache**: Located in `node_modules/.vite/` - auto-invalidated on dependency changes
- **Production Builds**: Automatic content hashing for cache busting (`assets/[name]-[hash].js`)

## Reminders and Notes
- Development environment is stable and working correctly
- Vite cache is properly configured for optimal development experience
- Brand logo integrated with CSS filter optimization for luxury theming
- Authentication system complete with JWT + bcrypt security
- 4-tier membership system with role-based permissions implemented
- Data synchronization service complete with enterprise-grade features
- **Navigation system complete with consistent header across all pages**
- **Full routing system implemented for all main module functions**
- **Authentication modal system integrated with navigation**
- **Complete authentication forms with validation and error handling**
- **Login/register functionality fully operational**
- Project status: Core platform complete and ready for Phase 2 development

## Brand Assets
### Logo Implementation
- **Logo File**: `client/public/logo.jpeg` - Official SheSocial logo with heart-shaped couple silhouettes
- **Header Integration**: 48x48px with luxury gold CSS filter treatment
- **Favicon**: Logo set as browser favicon and PWA icon
- **Color Optimization**: CSS filters applied to match luxury gold theme
  ```css
  filter: brightness-0 invert sepia saturate-[3] hue-rotate-[25deg] brightness-[1.2]
  ```
- **Alternative Options**: SVG conversion recommended for perfect scaling and easy color changes

## Recent Development Logs

### Vite and Dependencies Challenges
- Experienced Vite v7.0.3 build issues
- Error in `src/types/database.ts`: No matching export for `UserProfile`
- Build failure in `src/store/authStore.ts`
- Two versions of `offline-dbs.ts` detected
- Successful dependency optimization for react-dom/client, dexie, zustand
